snippet: The Orioles had elected not to hold Mark Teixeira, slowed by a nagging calf injury, on base. In Game 5, he took advantage with a stolen base that led to the first run of the game.
abstract: New York Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira's stolen base is pivotal in team's Game 5 victory over Baltimore Orioles in American League division series.
lead_paragraph: The Orioles had elected not to hold Mark Teixeira, slowed by a nagging calf injury, on base. In Game 5, he took advantage with a stolen base that led to the first run of the game.

headline.seo: Mark Teixeira’s Stolen Base Helps Lift Yankees Over Orioles in A.L.D.S.
headline.main: Teixeira’s Stolen Base Gets the Yankees Moving
headline.print_headline: Teixeira’s Stolen Base Gets the Yankees Moving
